member.name: ISoftwareBitmapNativeFactory.CreateFromMF2DBuffer2
member.summary: Creates a Windows Runtime SoftwareBitmap object from the provided .
member.param: The source buffer containing a two-dimensional surface, such as a video frame.
A GUID specifying the video subtype of the source buffer.
The width of the source surface.
The height of the source surface.

param.name: forceReadOnly
param.para: A value indicating whether the created software bitmap is read-only.
param.div: Note The read-only access applies only to the Windows Runtime SoftwareBitmap object. Access to the underlying Media Foundation buffer is not restricted.

member.param: The rectangular area within the surface that contains valid image data. Use NULL if the full frame is valid.
The interface to obtain from the created SoftwareBitmap object. This is usually Windows.Graphics.Imaging.ISoftwareBitmap.
When this method returns successfully, contains the requested interface.

member.name: ISoftwareBitmapNativeFactory.CreateFromWICBitmap
member.summary: Creates a Windows Runtime SoftwareBitmap object from the provided .

param.name: forceReadOnly
param.para: A value indicating whether the created software bitmap is read-only.
param.div: Note The read-only access applies only to the Windows Runtime SoftwareBitmap object. Access to the underlying WIC bitmap is not restricted.

member.param: The interface to obtain from the created SoftwareBitmap object. This is usually Windows.Graphics.Imaging.ISoftwareBitmap.
When this method returns successfully, contains the requested interface.
